questions.body: How can the impact of intercompany purchases and sales be offset?
questions.answer: Post journals to an elimination subsidiary

questions.body: Where is the purchase approval limit (amount) defined for supervisors?
Which setting allows returned items to be counted as part of inventory?
Which use case requires the use of a report rather than a search?

Which two statements are true about the functionality in Report Builder? A.) Users can customize data through Edit Layout Page. B.) User can export Reports as an Excel Web Query. C.) Users can add custom HTML inot column headers. D.) Users can add formula fields to columns.
What is the first step an Admin should take after being notified that an employee will be terminated?
Which structure will allow the tracking of consolidated financial reports by a legal entity?
What is the impact of enabling the Advanced Shipping feature?
What is the simplest way to compare Roles?
Which two methods can be used to restrict access to a file from the file cabinet?
questions.answer: Restrict Folder to Group and Mark Folder as Private

questions.body: Which three actions can be accomplished with a CSV Import? A.) Delete Customer lead records. B.) Add Transaction records. C.) Add and or Update items. D.) Update existing entity records
How can a customer's custom negotiated sales price for items be set up to default on sales transactions?
questions.answer: Assign a price level on the customer record

questions.body: What are three unique features to Financial Report Builder? a.) Sections may be shared between finacial reports. b.) Sections may have a highlighted results. c.) Sections are defined by additional sorts, orrided layout sorts. d.) Sections may have specific sorting. e.) Sections may contain subsidiary context.

Which two options for defining custom roles will restric the pool of recourds that a role can access? a.) Employee Restrictions. b.) Location Restrictions. c.) Restricted Form. d.) IP Address Restrictions
Which feature requires a user to agree to the Mass Messaging Application Terms of Service?
Where can the NeSuite Account Number be found?
Which option must be selected to allow sales reps and managers to adjust the statuses of opportunities when saving forecasts?
questions.answer: Allow Setting Status in Forecast Editor

questions.body: What is the purpose of checking the Internal Only check box on a Case Form?
questions.answer: To email the comments in the Reply window to copied employees

questions.body: Which three Customer Payment Methods are supported in NetSuite?
questions.answer: Electronicn Funds Transfer, Credit Card Processing for Sales Orders, and PayPal Express for Web Stores

questions.body: What are three attributes of saved searches? a. Reveals hierarchical groupings. b. Are the basis for custom metrics. c. Can have critical data highlighted. d. Provices a dynamic list of results. e. Good for point-in-time analysis

Which three statments are true about creating a Custom Role? a. They can be started from scratch. b. The can be started from a Standard Role. c. They can be edited after they are created. d. They can be deleted while they are assigned.
Why might user A not see user B's Calendar?
questions.answer: User B's calendar is not shared as Public

questions.body: What allows more than 10,000 messages to be sent in a single email campaign?
What is a recommended practice when adding a user?
A user just closed the record for a customer name Company A by mistake.What is the recommended method to go directly back to the Customer record for Company A?
Which action can be taken to optimize NetSuites performance in a browser?
questions.answer: Use the smallest portlet level refresh

questions.body: What information is displayed in a pop-up window after double clicking the NetSuite logo?

Which two statements are true regarding billable line items on invoices? a. Vendors can enter timesheets. b. Purchase Orders must be Billed before they can be Invoiced to Customers. c. Items must have a Sales Price fill in to appear on the Items to be Billed tab. d. Employees can bill time to customers in different subsidiaries
Which statement is true about inventory transactions?
questions.answer: The inventory worksheet can be used to create opening balances for items

questions.body: How does enabling the Advanced Receiving feature change the Item Receipt function in NetSuite?
questions.answer: It separates the Item Recipt from the Vendor Bill

questions.body: Which statement is true about NetSuite's ecommerce functionality?
questions.answer: Shopping cart automatically saves sales orders in the system

questions.body: Where does an Administrator turn on Custom Records?
What are three default CRM List types? a. Contact Role b. Win/Loss Reason c. Contact Type d. Buying Reason e. Quota Category
In a Saved Search, what are two ways to get the transaction date to display as month and year?
questions.answer: Use the month function on the Result field or Create a Formula Field using a SQL date formatting function

questions.body: In a OneWorld account, which Two Steps are required to make items taxable?
questions.answer: Create tax schedules for groups of Items and Assign a tax schedule on the item record

questions.body: How does Multi-Location Inventory affect costing?
questions.answer: Costs are calculated at the location level

questions.body: Where can statuses be mapped to actions for the progress of Lead to Prospect to Customer?
Which Sales Order transaction form can generate a Cash Sale upon billing?
Which configuration would allow a user to see only child items?
questions.answer: From comapay set up endable features, under items and inbentory set to only show last sub item

questions.body: Which three Item Types can be defined for Purchase, Resale, or Sale?
questions.answer: Non-inventory item, Service and other charge

questions.body: What are three attributes of a custom report?
questions.answer: Are available for Web Query, Are the basis for custom report snapshots and PRovide a point in time analysis

questions.body: What are three methods to access Help in NetSuite?
questions.answer: Help link in top right of screen, Type Help with any keyword in Global Search, Click the field label next to a field

questions.body: Which three pieces of information are contained in the New Release Portlet?
questions.answer: New Feature Overview, Release Preview Test Plan and Release Notes
